subject: assertEquals NullPointerException
msgSnippet: I have a class Complex representing complex numbers, and i have a class ComplexTest testing them. i get a NullPointerException at the following peice of
messageBody:
I have a class "Complex" representing complex numbers, and i have a
class "ComplexTest" testing them. i get a NullPointerException at the
following peice of code in my test class:

*****************
public class ComplexTest extends TestCase {

private Complex a;
private Complex b;

// private Complex d;

protected void setUp() {
Complex a = new Complex(1.0,2.0);
Complex b = new Complex(2.0,3.0);


}

public void testAdd() {

Complex d = new Complex(3.0,5.0);
assertEquals(d,a.plus(b)); //EXCEPTION BROUGHT UP HERE!
}


public static void main (String args [])
{
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(ComplexTest.class);
}

}
**********************

even thou a.plus(b) is valid in the complex class-it doesn't even
fail the test, just throws an exception :(

ANy suggestions would be helpful..

regards,
Ro
